Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: Joe - jokapaikan hoyla
programme.desc: Tim Allenin esittama Joe on mies, jonka elama on muuttunut vakaasti aina vain surkeammaksi. Kun toimiston kiusaaja menee liian pitkalle, Joe paattaa vihdoin muuttua mitattomyydesta joksikin paremmaksi.

programme.title: Balls Out: Gary the Tennis Coach
programme.desc: Yhdysvaltalaisen opinahjon sahlari vahtimestari ryhtyy koulun hairikkonuorten tennisvalmentajaksi. Tavoitteena on voittaa Nebraskan osavaltion tennismestaruus.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Sinun, minun ja meidan (Yours, Mine and Ours)
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid ja Rene Russo tahdittavat tata ihastuttavaa uudelleenfilmatisointia vuoden 1968 samannimisesta elokuvasta. Leskeksi jaanyt rannikkovartioston amiraali ja leskeksi jaanyt kasilaukkujen suunnittelija rakastuvat ja menevat naimisiin, mika aiheuttaa suurta harmia hanen 10 ja hanen 8 lapselleen. Lasten juonitellessa vanhempiensa erottamiseksi he tajuavat, etta tarkeinta on perhe.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Kun lahetti toimittaa vahingossa katkettyja kokaiinitiilia sisaltavan paketin vaaraan osoitteeseen, han kaynnistaa tapahtumasarjan, jossa kokaiinia etsivat ja siita taistelevat epatoivoisesti sen lahettanyt raivostunut diileri, peloissaan olevat vastaanottajat, joille lahetys oli menossa ja paketin vahingossa vastaanottaneet henkilot, jotka aikovat varastaa sen.

programme.title: Kostaja haudan takaa
programme.desc: Jimmylla on pakkomielle saada yhteys kuolleeseen aitiinsa mustan magian kautta ja han on pelottavan lahella onnistua. Mutta kun hanen uusi ystavansa Amir yrittaa saada hanet tekemaan vaikutuksen koulun kuumimpiin tyttoihin yksinkertaisella rituaalilla, jatkat vapauttavat pahan voiman, joka voi herattaa kuolleet ja tehda aidista zombien.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: Trinity ratsastaa jalleen
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kierteleva Trinity on palannut! Talla kertaa lannen nopein Trinity ja hanen velipuolensa, rautanyrkkinen Bambino lyottaytyvat yhteen kunnioittaakseen isansa viimeista toivetta. Kuolinvuoteellaan isa oli toivonut pojistaan tulevan kunniallisia, tyonsa vakavasti ottavia lainsuojattomia, joiden paista virkavalta voisi kitsastelematta luvata muhkean palkkion. Veljekset kuitenkin huomaavat, etta isan toiveen toteuttaminen on helpommin sanottu kuin tehty. Hakeutumalla innokkaasti vaikeuksiin ja tappeluihin kaikkialla minne paatyvatkaan, Trinity ja Bambino toivovat nostavansa summaa etsintakuulutuksissaan...

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: Big Mommas House
programme.desc: Karannutta vankia jahtaava agentti Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) lahtee suorittamaan peitetehtavaa ja pukeutuu maarailevaksi ja isokokoiseksi mummoksi, joka mottaa yhta kovaa kuin komentaakin.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years Of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe Khatchadorianilla on vaikeasti lausuttava sukunimi, valtavan vilkas mielikuvitus... ja ongelmia auktoriteettien kanssa. Rafe ei ole mikaan vallankumouksellinen anarkisti, mutta han on kuitenkin aloittamassa koulunkayntia jo jarjestyksessa kolmannella ylaasteellaan. Rafen toita paiskiva yksinhuoltajaaiti toivoo, etta tama koulu lopultakin sopisi hanen pojalleen. Mutta Hills Villagen ylaasteella yksilonvapautta ei kunnioiteta, vaan voimassa ovat epaoikeudenmukaiset kayttaytymissaannot. Rehtori-Dwight ei jata huomioimatta yhtakaan rikkomusta, koska han haluaa pysya ykkosena alueen koulujen suoritustilastoissa.

programme.title: The Rules of Attraction
programme.desc: Jessica Biel, James Van Der Beek ja Ian Somerhalder tuovat elamaa ja naurua tahan rehelliseen, nokkelaan tarinaan yliopiston sosiaalisista ja seksuaalisista suhteista.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Of Black
programme.desc: Tassa paattomassa spoofkomediassa, joka ottaa elokuvan "Fifty Shades of Grey" lempeaan kasittelyynsa, tapaamme mystisen miljonaarin Christian Blackin, joka, huolimatta puutteellisista kyvyistaan sangyssa, paattaa vietella ujon collegeopiskelijan Hannah Steelen ja johdattaa hanet "romantiikan" maailmaan.

programme.title: Fat Kid Rules The World
programme.desc: Troy Billings on seitsemantoista, ylipainoinen ja itsetuhoinen. Juuri kun han aikoo hypata bussin eteen, hanet pelastaakin Marcus, lukion kesken jattanyt hurmaava katumuusikko. Kaksikon valille syntyy orastava ystavyyssuhde kun Marcus ottaa musiikillisilta taidoiltaan vajavaisen Troyn rumpaliksi uuteen punkbandiin. Troy ei aavista, etta hanen pienena hupina pitamassaan asiassa onkin kyse Marcusin halusta paasta punkrockin huipulle, keinolla milla hyvansa..

programme.title: Nimeni on Trinity - paholaisen oikea kasi
programme.desc: Villia lantta ilman tarkempaa paamaaraa kiertava Trinity paatyy polyiseen pikkukaupunkiin, jossa hanta odottaa todellinen yllatys. Hanen lainsuojaton velipuolensa Bambino on kaupungin sheriffi! Tosin Bambino on ottanut pestin vastaan vain, koska on jalleen lakia paossa ja tarvitsee valehenkilollisyytta piiloutuakseen... Kaupungin mahtavimmalla miehella, majuri Harrimanilla on saalimattomia suunnitelmia valtansa ja maa-alueittensa kasvattamiseksi, mutta laheisessa laaksossa asuva mormoniyhdyskunta on suunnitelmien tiella. Harriman miehineen aikoo vaikka vakipakolla ajaa mormonit alueelta... Mutta yhdyskunnan kanssa ystavystynyt Trinity sotkee mielellaan Harrimanin kuviot.

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: Rakkaus voittaa kaiken. Jopa vastustamattoman pakon syoda kumppaninsa aivokudosta! Lahitulevaisuudessa maapallolla asuu yhta paljon ihmisia syovia zombeja kuin myos zombeja vastaan taistelevia ihmisia. Hetken mielijohteesta nuori zombi R pelastaa toisten zombien hyokkaykselta Julien, jonka suonissa veri virtaa kovaa. Heidan ystavyytensa uhkaa sen hetkista maailmanjarjestysta! Julien pitaa vain pysya hengissa ja R:n pitaa pysya kuolleena tarpeeksi kauan.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: John Wayne plays a man wrongly convicted of murder in this exciting western drama from Lone Star Pictures. Youll enjoy plenty of gun action and thundering hoofbeats as he escapes from jail and then joins a gang, hoping to find the real killer! Director Armand Schaefer (The Miracle Rider, The Lost Jungle) whips up some fine performances from a cast of B-movie favorites, including Lane Chandler (Samson and Delilah) and the great stunt rider, Yakima Canutt. And of course, the film features plenty of fight scenes, made memorable by John Waynes big swinging right fist! For film buffs: This was one of 11 films Wayne starred in that year, making 1933 one of the busiest years of Waynes...

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: Hoppy Serves a Writ
programme.desc: Sheriff Hopalong Cassidy triumphs again in this lighthearted western romp from Harry Sherman Productions. Good ol Hoppy (William Boyd) has to leave his beloved Texas to track down some bad guys in Oklahoma. You can bet that the action and suspense will follow Hopalong wherever he goes. Also, look for a number of familiar faces in the ast, including TVs future Superman George Reeves, notorious Hollywood heavy Victor Jory, and in his first credited role, Robert Mitchum! In fact, Mitchum would appear in more of Hoppys adventures before branching out on his own and becoming one of Hollywoods greatest stars. Also featuring Jan Christy, Forbes Murray, Byron Foulger, Earle Hodgins, and Roy...

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Ridin the Lone Trail
programme.desc: Sam Newfield directs this Western about a group of outlaws who are robbing stagecoaches while being led by a mysterious outlaw on a beautiful white horse. Bob McArthur (Bob Steele) arrives to help and makes a shocking discovery when he follows the white horse to the outlaws hideout. This B-Western, one of a long line of Sam Newfield efforts, also stars Claire Rochelle and Charles King (who has over 400 acting credits to his name, beginning with The Birth of a Nation in 1915 and ending in 1957 (his death)!

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteers head.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Gypsy Traders, a band of gypsies settles down in the Montana Territory to take advantage of the copper stakes theyve made in the region. In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kates intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following their activity with the Quantrill Raiders, the Younger Brothers return on the scene to commit a bank robbery in Minnesota. Detectives Matt and Frankie work to put a stop to their plan. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, George Wallace, Gregory Walcott, Louise Beavers, and Sheb Wooley. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode originally aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: The notorious John Wesley Hardin kills two people while on a cattle drive to Abilene. Matt and Frankie head out to bring him to justice. Richard Webb stars as John Wesley Hardin. Also starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Howard Negley, Robert Karnes amd John Eldredge. Directed by William Witney. Episode originally aired April 9, 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge deals with a rigged election. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: A young boy runs away from home because he thinks his father is a coward for not standing up to his abusive boss. Jeff and Roy have to find the boy and convince him that his father is just doing what he has to do in order to provide for his family. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Since the arrival of a Lt. Smith, members of the Iroquois tribe keep turning up dead. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper.Episode originally aired December 25, 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Wagon Wheels
programme.desc: Randolph Scott (Ride the High Country) stars as Clint Belmet, the leader of a wagon train on the way to Oregon. Along the route he and his crew deal with various hardships, including Indian attacks and a fellow named Murdock (Monte Blue) who is out to stop them at any cost. With a cast that includes the likes of Gail Patrick and Billy Lee, this adventure saga was based on a novel by the western master, Zane Grey (Riders of the Purple Sage, Fighting Caravans). Trivia note: The films original title was Caravans West.

programme.title: Wildfire: The Story of a Horse
programme.desc: Fanning (John Miljan) has his men rustle horses and then blame it on a wild horse named Wildfire. Happy and Alkali arrive and immediately get into trouble with Fanning and his men. When Alkali is shot, Happy catches the outlaws but the Judge not only releases them, he discharges the Sheriff and tries to arrest Happy for rustling! Starring Bob Steele and Sterling Holloway, directed by Robert Emmett Tansey. 1945 (Color).

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones, a feisty young woman, attempts to stake her claim in the cattle business despite threats from greedy land grabbers and their hired killers.

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: Desperadoes of the West
programme.desc: A group of ranchers, led by Colonel Arnold and Ward Gordon, are drilling an oil well but getting fierce opposition from an unknown gang of outlaws. Eastern promoter J.B. Dude Dawson is behind the gang as he is out to prevent the co-op members from striking oil before their lease expires, so he can secure the property for his company. When Ward, with the help of Arnold and his daughter Sally, arranges for a new driller to be brought in, the replacement man is killed and one of Dawsons men takes his place.

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. Its all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Son of the Renegade
programme.desc: Johnny Carpenter (who also wrote the screenplay) stars as Red River Johnny, a gunslinger returning to his home town to clear his name of some heinous accusations. This low budget howler was the only feature directed by Reg Brown, who was better known as an editor and a director of television shows. If Ed Wood directed a western, it might have looked like this one. Enjoy!

programme.title: Springtime in the Rockies
programme.desc: Gene Autry stars as a ranch foreman who helps a beautiful young ranch owner who faces the opposition of local ranchers after bringing a flock of sheep into cattle country. Along with the traditional title song, musical numbers include Youre the Only Star In My Blue Heaven, Buffalo Gals, and Give Me a Pony and an Open Prairie. This Republic Pictures gem includes the usual stock company of actors, with the matchless Smiley Burnette as Genes comical sidekick, Frog Millhouse. Directed by Joseph Kane; written by Gilbert Wright, Betty Burbridge; Also starring Polly Rowles, Ruth Bacon, and George Chesebro.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the worlds most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Safe Crackers, Pat and Stoney are ordered to break up a safe cracking gang preying on Colorado banks handling government silver bullion. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In this episode, the G-Men go to Denver to investigate a silver fraud. Starring Russel Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kates Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie arrivein the California gold fields where Frankie is kidnapped by the infamous bandit Joaquin Murietta. Without his usualy partner, Matt enlists the help of Captain Harry Love. Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, and Robert Anderson. Look for Rick Jason as Murietta. Jason would later go on to star in the popular ABC war series Combat!

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Following the murder of a railroad agent, Matt and Frankie work to bring the vengeful Tiburcio Vasquez to justice. Starring Jim Davis, mary Castle,Anthony Caruso, Edward Colmas, Lillian Molieri, and Eddie Parker. Also, look for Glenn Strange as Sheriff Billy Rowland. Strange was known for playing Frankensteins monster in several Universal pictures, as well as a recurring role on Gunsmoke. Also, Eddie Parker, who plays a trapper in this episode, was one of Hollywoods most revered stuntmen. Directed by William Witney. Epsiode oringinally aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a woman arrives in town looking for her son. Roy checks around, and finds out that her son is not only in the area, but has become a notorious outlaw. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Spirit of the Law
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean intervenes when two brothers accuse each other of crimes including cattle rustling. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a group of settlers trapped in the Hurons territory.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye teams up with Benjamin Franklin to take down a tyrant.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After Farmer Perkins murders a store clerk in front of his wife, and is allowed to walk after his trial, the Cartwrights step in to make sure hell be rearrested, tried, and hung.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Crashing Thru
programme.desc: Down the danger trail sweeps a crimson fury... as Renfrew rides again! In this action-packed adventure, Sgt. Renfrew must face off against a group of criminals involved in a gold robbery. With his partner, Constable Kelly, wounded in a gunfight, Renfrew must stop the thieves on his own. Directed by Elmer Clifton; starring James Newill and Warren Hull, this is one adventure you wont want to miss!

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos
programme.desc: Roy Rogers finds himself elected sheriff in a wild Texas town after the Civil War. But can Roy handle a place under martial law? And can he save Gabby Hayes from being executed? And how many songs will he get to sing? Clear the burrs from your saddle and get ready for a good one, also starring Marjorie Reynolds, plus Sally Payne as Belle Starr, Queen of the Oklahoma Outlaws!

programme.title: Song of Arizona
programme.desc: This Roy Rogers adventure finds Gabby Whitaker (Gabby Hayes) running a ranch for wayward boys. One of the boys uses stolen money to help Gabby pay off his debts, but things unravel when the boys father, a notorious outlaw named King Blaine, is murdered; the rest of the Blaine gang show up at Gabbys looking for the loot! Director Frank McDonald works with a fine cast, including Dale Evans, Lyle Talbot, and of course, Roys beloved horse Trigger.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: The Dawn Rider
programme.desc: John Wayne was still a few years from major stardom when he appeared as John Mason, a man seeking revenge for his fathers murder. Marion Burns stars as Alice, Masons love interest, while Reed Howes stars as Masons friend and rival for Alices affection. When Mason finally tracks down the man responsible for his fathers death, will Ben help, or stand in his way? Produced by Lone Star Pictures, the group behind many of Waynes early films, The Dawn Rider is a stirring yarn about the price of vengeance.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: Randolph Scott plays James Barlow, an agent from Chicago hired to bring the notorious Reno brothers to justice. But wouldnt you know it? The Reno gang includes a beautiful young woman (Mala Powers), who catches Barlows eye. This western from director Tim Whelan (The Thief of Bagdad) features cinematography by two-time Oscar winner Ray Rennahan (Gone With The Wind), while the screenplay was by noted author Horace McCoy (They Shoot Horses, Dont They?). Theres also an all-star cast, including Forrest Tucker, J. Carrol Naish, Edgar Buchanan, Denver Pyle, and several other shaggy sidewinders!

programme.title: Riders of the Deadline
programme.desc: The 50th of 66 Hopalong Cassidy films finds Hoppy in a vengeful mood. When his good friend Tim Mason is unjustly sent to jail and then killed when trying to escape, Hoppys bitterness gets him drummed out of the Texas Rangers. With the help of his pals California Carson and Jimmy Rogers, he sets out to expose the real culprits and clear Tims name. The usual cast is here, including William Boyd as Hoppy, plus Andy Clyde, Jimmy Rogers, and in one of his earliest roles, Robert Mitchum.

programme.title: 71st Macau GP: FR Macau Grand Prix - FIA FR World Cup - Race
programme.desc: Watch the livestream of the 71st Macau Grand Prix FR Macau Grand Prix 15 lap race as it happens.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: Jenson Button Revisits His Biggest Racing Moments - F1, WEC, NASCAR and more
programme.desc: Jenson Button, current Hertz Team JOTA WEC driver and former F1 World Champion shares never-before-heard details on his wild 2009 title run with Brawn, his final F1 race in Monaco while subbing in for Fernando Alonso, the terrifying truth about his malfunctioning helmet in 2004, and more.

programme.title: Seven ways F1 teams covered up tobacco advertising
programme.desc: Ferrari and McLaren both changed branding on their cars for the Australian Grand Prix, due to complaints about their links to tobacco companies. That brought back memories of when several teams on the grid carried full-on tobacco sponsorship, and they would have to change their liveries when racing in countries where cigarette sponsorship was outlawed. In this video we take a look back at seven popular methods that were used by teams during this period.

programme.title: Nine times F1 drivers lost maiden victories
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc’s heartbreaking lost victory in the Bahrain Grand Prix brought back memories of other times in Formula 1 history that drivers missed out on a maiden win. In this list we take a look at some of the most painful of those stories, and the variety of reasons that robbed drivers of their first chance to stand on the top step of an F1 podium.

programme.title: Five moments that shaped F1s first 1000 races
programme.desc: Formula 1 celebrates the 1000th world championship race this weekend in China, and to kick off the festivities were looking back at races from its history that have defined the way F1 has changed over the years. Join Edd Straw and Stuart Codling from the paddock in Shanghai to take a journey through some of the most important moments that have got us to the 1000th race

programme.title: Top 10 Senna Moments
programme.desc: Qualifying performances from "another dimension"; thrashing his rivals repeatedly in torrential wet conditions; doing whatever it took to win the world championship at all costs. Ayrton Sennas too-brief time in Formula 1 was a colourful tapestry of brilliant driving and high-stakes controversy. On the 25th anniversary of his tragic crash at Imola, Autosport brings you the most unforgettable moments of the late Brazilians F1 career.

programme.title: Gearing Up 2025 - Episode 8: The Baja España Aragon
programme.desc: Welcome to the eighth episode of Gearing Up for 2025! It’s the TV series that takes you around the globe, following the hottest action from some of the world’s most unique competitions. High skills, passion for technology, impatience for innovation, and pure love for adrenaline, are combined at their best. So, start your engines, tighten your seat belts, and get ready to feel the G-force with some serious action! We start in Europe at the Baja España Aragon, where over 160 teams compete across cars, bikes, quads, and trucks. Lorenzo Santolino and Jao Ferreira dominate the motorcycle and car categories, while Martin Maciek showcases the raw power of trucks in a thrilling...

programme.title: 2024-2025 ALMS: Round 5 - 4 Hours of Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: Algarve Pro Racing dominated the first race in Abu Dhabi, securing a dramatic 1-2 finish after a thrilling final-lap overtake.

programme.title: 71st Macau GP: FR Macau Grand Prix - FIA FR World Cup - Race
programme.desc: Watch the livestream of the 71st Macau Grand Prix FR Macau Grand Prix 15 lap race as it happens.

programme.title: Motorsport Images: An Enduring Legacy
programme.desc: 26 million images. 100 years of racing. This is the story of Motorsport Images, the premiere photographic agency and archive covering motorsport and motoring. It is unique in that it provides photography of all major current motorsport events, from Formula One Grand Prix racing to national level racing, as well as archive images documenting the history of the sport dating back to 1895.

programme.title: Jenson Button Revisits His Biggest Racing Moments - F1, WEC, NASCAR and more
programme.desc: Jenson Button, current Hertz Team JOTA WEC driver and former F1 World Champion shares never-before-heard details on his wild 2009 title run with Brawn, his final F1 race in Monaco while subbing in for Fernando Alonso, the terrifying truth about his malfunctioning helmet in 2004, and more.

programme.title: Seven ways F1 teams covered up tobacco advertising
programme.desc: Ferrari and McLaren both changed branding on their cars for the Australian Grand Prix, due to complaints about their links to tobacco companies. That brought back memories of when several teams on the grid carried full-on tobacco sponsorship, and they would have to change their liveries when racing in countries where cigarette sponsorship was outlawed. In this video we take a look back at seven popular methods that were used by teams during this period.

programme.title: Nine times F1 drivers lost maiden victories
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc’s heartbreaking lost victory in the Bahrain Grand Prix brought back memories of other times in Formula 1 history that drivers missed out on a maiden win. In this list we take a look at some of the most painful of those stories, and the variety of reasons that robbed drivers of their first chance to stand on the top step of an F1 podium.

programme.title: Five moments that shaped F1s first 1000 races
programme.desc: Formula 1 celebrates the 1000th world championship race this weekend in China, and to kick off the festivities were looking back at races from its history that have defined the way F1 has changed over the years. Join Edd Straw and Stuart Codling from the paddock in Shanghai to take a journey through some of the most important moments that have got us to the 1000th race

programme.title: Top 10 Senna Moments
programme.desc: Qualifying performances from "another dimension"; thrashing his rivals repeatedly in torrential wet conditions; doing whatever it took to win the world championship at all costs. Ayrton Sennas too-brief time in Formula 1 was a colourful tapestry of brilliant driving and high-stakes controversy. On the 25th anniversary of his tragic crash at Imola, Autosport brings you the most unforgettable moments of the late Brazilians F1 career.

programme.title: Gearing Up 2025 - Episode 8: The Baja España Aragon
programme.desc: Welcome to the eighth episode of Gearing Up for 2025! It’s the TV series that takes you around the globe, following the hottest action from some of the world’s most unique competitions. High skills, passion for technology, impatience for innovation, and pure love for adrenaline, are combined at their best. So, start your engines, tighten your seat belts, and get ready to feel the G-force with some serious action! We start in Europe at the Baja España Aragon, where over 160 teams compete across cars, bikes, quads, and trucks. Lorenzo Santolino and Jao Ferreira dominate the motorcycle and car categories, while Martin Maciek showcases the raw power of trucks in a thrilling...

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition, a look at the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp and the uncompromising performance of Mercedes-AMGs SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 Plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8; V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour; a supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: MotorStories

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: German entrepreneur Tillmann Miritz loves vintage cars and has one dream: A trip through the USA with his Mercedes Cabriolet 280 SE 3.5. But before he can make his dream come true, he needs to get his car across the French Riviera.

programme.title: MotorStories
programme.desc: Tillmann starts his dream journey in New York, the city that never sleeps; with his Mercedes 280 SE convertible he visits the legendary classic car dealer Eliot Cuker who made his fortune with his passion for old cars.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Following the progress of driver Uwe Nittle, as he gets ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A look at the RCN Challenge: The BMW Driving Experience and the Devils Diner.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Now that the 24-hour race is over we have left the Nuerburgring and moved to Bueren, Germany, where Raeder Sport is based. Famous for really fast front-wheel drives, it provides a lot of horsepower down on the track.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The track at Nuerburgring is used for bike riding and running.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb of 1987: A different type of race in the mountains of Colorado, USA.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: Since 1934, the Grand Prix has been the most exciting and fascinating world championship in the world. With its state-of-the-art vehicles, with horsepower from the biggest brands, it never fails to wow its viewers.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.desc: The International Championship for Manufacturers was a rally series which ran from 1970 - 1972.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Paul has to slide underneath an exploding vehicle, while Anna is catapulted in the air.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: One stuntman has to go head over heels in his car, while two colleagues combine a car chase with a fistfight.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Stuntmen operate an Artega GT at full speed with a remote control.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur

programme.desc: Mr. Bean loves bird spotting and is desperate to tick off the last elusive bird in his book.

programme.title: Superhero Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a superhero in an attempt to stop a cunning thief.

programme.title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket has a new hat that looks like Scrapper.

programme.title: Hopping Mad!
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that tons of toads weigh loads and loads.

programme.title: Wrestle Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to read a book but he is disturbed by the noise of Mrs. Wicket and her friend.

programme.title: Valentines Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to be romantic, but his idea of what that means is different to Irmas.

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum, at all costs.

programme.title: Pizza Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean orders a takeaway pizza, but when it arrives, he feels let down by the size of it.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker.

programme.title: Keyboard Capers
programme.desc: Determined to play the piano, Mr Bean finds a tune in his heart and sausages for fingers.

programme.title: Super-Trolley
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a supermarket super trolley.

programme.title: The Big Stink
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor.

programme.title: Artful Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.title: Bean Painting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean paints a picture of Teddy, but accidentally splashes some green paint on the wall.

programme.title: Dead Cat
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to replace his landlady’s cat after an unfortunate ‘accident’.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Save That Tree
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down.

programme.title: All You Can Eat
programme.desc: Irma is coming for dinner, but Mr. Bean has forgotten about it and so doesnt have anything to cook.

programme.title: Goldfish
programme.desc: Mr Bean nearly gets fed to the fish!

programme.title: A Grand Invitation
programme.desc: Mr Bean is all at sea with the landed gentry.

programme.title: Beans Safari
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Mr. Bean prepares to give the children some tricks and treats they wont forget.

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes to the air after being taken for a ride.

programme.title: Home Movie
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attempts to make his own home movie – a horror thriller with Mrs. Wicket as the star!

programme.title: Hotel Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has some unexpected guests who think he runs a hotel!

programme.title: Birthday Bother
programme.desc: It’s Irma’s birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two –one nice, one silly.

programme.title: The Cruise
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Haunted House
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers the great outdoors is not always so great.

programme.title: Dancing Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean needs to learn to dance to impress his girlfriend Irma.

programme.title: In the Pink
programme.desc: Mr Bean, badgered by a strange pink animal, warms to the creature when it shows its true colours.

programme.title: Big TV
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price-tag to match.

programme.title: Wedding Day
programme.desc: A wedding car crashes, resulting in Bean coming to the rescue and offering the bride a lift.

programme.title: In The Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Bean decides to become a wildlife photographer.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: Mr Bean redecorates his room, making it fit for a Queen.

programme.title: Cat-Sitting
programme.desc: Mr Bean is forced to look after his worst enemy.

programme.title: Hot Date
programme.desc: Romance is in the air and Beans girlfriend is determined to have a piece of it.

programme.title: Treasure!
programme.desc: A puzzling puzzle has Mr Bean truly puzzled.

programme.title: Bean Hypnotised
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attends a hypnotism show where he unwittingly volunteers to be hypnotized.

programme.title: Trophy Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket’s Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course.

programme.title: In The Garden
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to cut the grass in the garden but finds it impossible.

programme.title: Chocks Away
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s hobby goes down in flames in his battle for air supremacy.

programme.title: The Lift
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes on a lift to the top floor of a toy shop, but Teddy gets stuck in the doors and jams the lift.

programme.title: Super Sky
programme.desc: Fascinated by the super spy show, Mr. Bean decides to become a super spy himself. When he becomes suspicious of the Bruisers planning something, he starts to follow them. Later, he notices that the Bruisers are putting an old lady into a van.

programme.title: She Sees
programme.desc: A blind woman grapples with the psychological trauma of being abused by a Dr meant to care for her but a chance meeting brings them together again but this time she see him for his crimes.

programme.title: Adùnní
programme.desc: Adunni struggles with the weight of a secret she carries, but when she finds out her secret isn’t limited to just her alone, she find the inner strength to seek justice and speak out.

programme.title: Composure
programme.desc: A marriage begins to suffer after the couple lose their unborn child. Things take a turn for the worse when the wife discovers her husband has been unfaithful and her mental health starts to spiral out of control.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 1
programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 2
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 3
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.desc: MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 6
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: Johnnie and Glyde
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Two young psychotic criminal lovers infiltrate the lives of an old married couple for financial gain.

programme.title: Cruise And Clout
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When a famous social media “power couple” find that they are losing their spotlight to a more relevant and entertaining couple, they decide to take drastic measures to get back their number one spot

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: What does an overprotective father with his hard-working daughter, and an unhappy marriage have in common? Things get fatal when unfounded assumptions and suspicions in these relationships take root in everyones mind.

programme.title: Super Sheroes
programme.desc: A cop, a lawyer, and a hacker form a team dedicated to securing justice for the oppressed and poor citizens. Their passion takes a new turn when an old friend becomes a perpetual victim of domestic violence and spousal abuse.

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 7
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: MTV Shuga Down South S3 Ep 8
programme.desc: The new season of MTV Shuga Down South kicks off with Thuli living unhappily with her aunt in KwaZulu-Natal. After an attempted rape incident, Thuli decides to take control of her own life

programme.title: Who Is Perfect
programme.desc: Gifts perception of marriage is forever altered during her childhood after her father takes their maid as his second wife after 20years of marriage, breaking her mothers heart. This causes Gift to be distructful and when she gets married, she refuses to get a maid to help despite calls for it from her husband, Ubong.

programme.title: He Is Mine
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. When his wife is kidnapped, Akin Richard’s life takes a terrible turn and he slips into depression. His revival and will to live comes from the love and affection from Sandra’s half-sister, Angela. After one year of mourning and sorrowing, they fall in love, and encouraged by the family, they get married. Akin is overjoyed until he receives a call that Sandra has been rescued alive; she is not dead after all.

programme.title: More Than a Friend
programme.desc: Simeon struggles in his romantic relationships due to his close friendship with his so-called business partner, Amanda.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: A family is left in disarray when Ada develops a crush on her sisters, Dorcas, husband, Mike. Things get out of hand when Ada decided to take action and get Mike by any means necessary.

programme.title: Officer No.7
programme.desc: When the only son of a middle-aged widow is killed by roadside policemen looking for a bribe, policemen begin to fall like flies with no known cause of death, leading the concerned dpo to invite the assistance of the crime investigation department who send in one of their foremost detectives as more bodies drop.

programme.title: The Auction
programme.desc: Bamidele, a famous musician whose career is taking a downturn, finds unexpected love when he is put up for auction!

programme.title: Game Change
programme.desc: A group of four friends who just recently graduated sort out their quest for the big money by carrying out a ponzi scheme. The success of the first one urges them to carry out another one. But this time, nothing goes as planned.

programme.title: We Did It For Love
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A desperate guy down on his luck deceitfully takes a loan from a loan shark to secure a future with his soul mate, a decision he soon regrets.

programme.title: Love Like Chocolate
programme.desc: Amanda and Olisa are in a perfect relationship, but Amanda dreads the idea of getting married until her most coveted job is threatened.

programme.title: Love Is Thicker
programme.desc: After Antonia had disapproved of all her twin brothers past girlfriends and also tried to set Lauretta up with him under conditions, Tony pops up with his actual girlfriend, who teaches her a hard-knock lesson.

programme.title: Like Theres No Tomorrow
programme.desc: Four friends come together for a sleep-over in celebration of their tenth-year graduation anniversary, however happy nostalgia, fun and games quickly morph into a race against time to save one of them, their host, a bubbly singer-songwriter with a weight on her shoulders, seems set to take her own life within twenty-four hours. Will a confession of long-held feelings, previously unrevealed for fears of ruining a great friendship, save her?

programme.title: Long Distance
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A man is confined to a wheelchair as a result of his wifes action. His mother moves in with them and constantly reminds the wife that it is her fault and the wife uses every opportunity to escape from the stifling situation. The family is thrown into chaos when a male nurse is hired.

programme.title: A Perfect Girlfriend
programme.desc: When being friends with benefits is no longer enough, what do you do? A woman falls in love with her best male friend but has to watch him dating other women.

programme.title: The Weekend
programme.desc: A woman discovers a heart-breaking secret. She plans a steamy intimate weekend with her husband, but this weekend is full of questions, anger, rage and blood. She will not stop until she gets her answers.

programme.title: Nepa
programme.desc: A troubled young man takes revenge against the Nigerian electric power authority when the constant lack of power supply leads to the sudden death of his wife at the local hospital

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Dara Simi
programme.desc: Brand new season with A list Nollywood celebrities! Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Jennifer Mairo
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Imperfect Lady
programme.desc: As tension rises within her marriage because of their childlessness, Tosin falls back into the arms of her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Love Across
programme.desc: Coming out of a very bad marriage, Osas is trying to pick the pieces of her life together and find means to emotionally and mentally take care of her children. When she meets a younger man, Dafe who falls deeply for her, everything looks new as she experiences true joy and love.

programme.title: Zuriels Diary
programme.desc: A heart-breaking family secret is unearth when words in a diary come back to haunt them.

programme.desc: Tassa lamminhenkisessa joulukomediassa Rodriguezin perheen kauempana asuvat jasenet kokoontuvat vanhempiensa kotiin kenties viimeista kertaa viettamaan joulua yhdessa.

programme.title: A Winter Princess
programme.desc: Hienon gaalan jalkeen prinsessa Carly paattaa pitaa sapattivuoden ja aloittaa unelmatyon hiihtokeskuksessa. Yksikaan uusista tyotovereista ei tieda, kuka han oikeasti on. Mutta kun kuninkaallisen suvun jasenia ilmestyy hiihtokeskukseen, salaisuutta on pian hyvin vaikea sailyttaa paljastumatta. Samalla valmistellaan keskuksen 50-vuotisjuhlia ja Carly huomaa ihastuneensa omistajan veljeen Jesseen. Carlyn taytyy tehda suuria paatoksia elamassaan ja han tuntee olevansa yha enemman ymmallaan.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas List
programme.desc: Hiljattain sairaalaan joutunut isoaiti antaa viimeisena toiveenaan tyttarelleen Michellelle ja tyttarentyttarelleen Saralle listan ennen joulua yhdessa tehtavista juhlatunnelmaa nostattavista asioista toivoen, etta naiden kahden kokema seikkailu korjaisi heidan suhteensa.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Tyoton taidemaalari Anna kamppailee taloutensa kanssa, mutta loytaa tyopaikan kirean liikemiehen Marcin henkilokohtaisena jouluostosten tekijana.

programme.title: A Taste Of Christmas
programme.desc: Kun pikkukaupungin yrittelias leipuri Emily saa omatekoisen joulukalenterin salaiselta ihailijalta, paikalliset haluavat kiihkeasti selvittaa lahettajan henkilollisyyden. Kaupungissa juoruillaan seka joulukalenterista etta Emilyn rakkausseikkailuista, koska kaikki poikamiehet ovat kiinnostuneita hanesta. Mutta Emilya kiinnostaa hanen pahin kilpailijansa, ranskalaisleipuri Gerard.

programme.title: Joulu tilauksesta
programme.desc: Gretchen saa joulun tapahtua missa ja milloin tahansa.

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming To Christmas Dinner?
programme.desc: Aktiivinen, liberaali ja edistyksellinen oikeustieteen opiskelija Maya tuo uuden poikaystavansa kotiin jouluksi - kertomatta perheelleen, etta han on valkoinen. Arvaa, kuka tulee joulupaivalliselle?

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Menestysmysteerikirjailija Mary Higgins Clarkin romaaniin perustuva elokuva nahdaan jouluna salapoliisitarinana. Naisetsiva lyottaytyy yksiin amatoorietsivan kanssa loytaakseen kadonneen isansa.

programme.title: A Christmas in Royal Fashion
programme.desc: Kansainvalisen PR-yrityksen kaunis ja lahjakas assistentti Kristin Cooper saa vastuulleen vaatealalla tyoskentelevan liikemies Carsonin vuotuisen joulun muotinaytoksen ja huutokaupan jarjestamisen.

programme.title: Lahetys joulua
programme.desc: Kun hanen lahetyskumppaninsa paattaa lahtea Amerikan suosikkiaamuohjelmasta, Veronika Daniels ilmoittaa valitsevansa uuden juontajakansa kourallisen ehdokkaiden joukosta, joihin kuuluu paikallinen New Yorkin uutislahettaja Charlie Fisher.

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Tanaan Chris on losangelesilainen musiikkimoguli, jolla riittaa misuja vaikka joka sormelle. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Joulukoristeita ja kulkusten kilinaa, musikaalilauluja ja zombimaailmanloppu. Kesken joulukiireiden pikkukaupunki Little Havenia uhkaa yllattaen lahestyva tuho. Anna ja hanen ystavansa paattavat taistella zombilaumoja vastaan – mutta kehen voi luottaa maailmassa, joka on romahtamaisillaan? Kauhukomedia jouluisessa musikaaliasussa.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Tassa lamminhenkisessa joulukomediassa Rodriguezin perheen kauempana asuvat jasenet kokoontuvat vanhempiensa kotiin kenties viimeista kertaa viettamaan joulua yhdessa.

programme.title: Happy New Year, Colin Burstead
programme.desc: Colin Burstead paattaa vuokrata ylellisen kartanon ja ottaa uuden vuoden vastaan perheen ja suvun kanssa. Kun David-veli ilmestyy kutsumatta paikalle, veljesten keskinainen kilpailu karjistyy huippuunsa. Uudenvuodenjuhlat, joista Colin oli toivonut suvun leppoisaa jalleennakemista, muuttuvat viheliaiseksi juonitteluksi. Happy New Year, Colin Burstead on kriitikoiden kehuman Ben Wheatleyn uusin elokuva, joka huokuu hanelle ominaista mustaa huumoria ja epasovinnaista kerrontaa.

programme.title: Jouluhaat
programme.desc: Haley Foster pakeni lapsuutensa pikkukaupungista Pineridgesta ja siirtyi suurkaupunkilaiselamaan losangelesilaisena haajarjestelijana rva Reynoldsin omistamassa eliittiluokan yrityksessa.

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: Menestysmysteerikirjailija Mary Higgins Clarkin romaaniin perustuva elokuva nahdaan jouluna salapoliisitarinana. Naisetsiva lyottaytyy yksiin amatoorietsivan kanssa loytaakseen kadonneen isansa.

programme.title: Another Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Toisilleen tuntemattomat Alice ja Jack, joilla on taysin erilainen tausta, paatyvat sattumalta samoihin viikonloppuhaihin. He pitavat heti toisistaan, mutta Alice arkailee uutta suhdetta, koska entinen kaukosuhde paattyi ikavasti. Alice alkaa kuitenkin Olga-aidin rohkaisemana tottua vahitellen ajatukseen deittailun aloittamisesta. Uudet yhteensattumat lahentavat nuoria toisiinsa, samalla kun tielle osuu yha uusia esteita, jotka vaikeuttavat juuri alkanutta romanssia.

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: Cooperien iso perhe kokoontuu viettamaan joulua yhdessa, mutta perinteisia kuvioita sotkevat yllatysvieraat.

programme.title: A Winter Princess
programme.desc: Hienon gaalan jalkeen prinsessa Carly paattaa pitaa sapattivuoden ja aloittaa unelmatyon hiihtokeskuksessa. Yksikaan uusista tyotovereista ei tieda, kuka han oikeasti on. Mutta kun kuninkaallisen suvun jasenia ilmestyy hiihtokeskukseen, salaisuutta on pian hyvin vaikea sailyttaa paljastumatta. Samalla valmistellaan keskuksen 50-vuotisjuhlia ja Carly huomaa ihastuneensa omistajan veljeen Jesseen. Carlyn taytyy tehda suuria paatoksia elamassaan ja han tuntee olevansa yha enemman ymmallaan.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys a Madea Christmas
programme.desc: Madea juhlistaa joulua yhdessa ystavansa ja taman maalla asuvan perheen kanssa. Nyt on parasta olla kilttina!

programme.title: Vain Frendeja
programme.desc: Tapaus: Chris Bander. High school -vuodet eivat sujuneet mallikkaasti: kaveri oli ujo, ylipainoinen ja toivottomasti rakastunut koulun suosituimpaan typyyn nimelta Jamie. Mutta kun Chris viimein saa kerattya tarpeeksi rohkeutta kertoakseen Jamielle tunteistaan, tytto sanoo haluavansa olla vain ystavia. Mutta kun Chris kohtalon oikusta sattuu kavaisemaan vanhoilla kotinurkillaan, sulavaliikkeiselle pelimiehelle avautuu uusi mahdollisuus yrittaa hurmata Jamie. Mutta frendivyohyke on paha, ja harvassa ovat sielta ulosmurtautuneet uskalikot.

programme.title: Silent Night: A Song for the World
programme.desc: Maailman kuuluisimman joululaulun syntytarina. Dokumenttielokuva kertoo, miten nuori Joseph Mohr paatyi kirjoittamaan vuonna 1818 ensiesityksensa saaneen laulun "Jouluyo, juhlayo".

programme.title: Furry Little Christmas
programme.desc: Suurkaupungin elainlaakari kaatuu pikkukaupungin laakariin, kun tama paattaa jarjestaa New Yorkin joulun hanen kotikaupungissaan Vermontissa.

programme.title: Lahetys joulua
programme.desc: Kun hanen lahetyskumppaninsa paattaa lahtea Amerikan suosikkiaamuohjelmasta, Veronika Daniels ilmoittaa valitsevansa uuden juontajakansa kourallisen ehdokkaiden joukosta, joihin kuuluu paikallinen New Yorkin uutislahettaja Charlie Fisher.

programme.title: Anna and the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Joulukoristeita ja kulkusten kilinaa, musikaalilauluja ja zombimaailmanloppu. Kesken joulukiireiden pikkukaupunki Little Havenia uhkaa yllattaen lahestyva tuho. Anna ja hanen ystavansa paattavat taistella zombilaumoja vastaan – mutta kehen voi luottaa maailmassa, joka on romahtamaisillaan? Kauhukomedia jouluisessa musikaaliasussa.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: Tassa lamminhenkisessa joulukomediassa Rodriguezin perheen kauempana asuvat jasenet kokoontuvat vanhempiensa kotiin kenties viimeista kertaa viettamaan joulua yhdessa.

programme.title: This is England 88 (Part 2)
programme.desc: Tuhoisat tapahtumat, jotka tapahtuivat 18 kuukautta sitten, vainoavat Lolia (Vicky McClure) ja Woodya (Joe Gilgun), jotka molemmat kamppailevat selvitakseen tunteellisesta tappiosta. Lol huomaa nopeasti, etta hanen voimavaransa ovat ehtymassa, kun han yrittaa hoitaa uusia vastuita ja vanhoja velvoitteita. Yhdessa sielunkumppaninsa Woodyn kanssa, joka on epatoivoinen petoksestaan ja itse valitsemastaan maanpaosta jengin ulkopuolella, Lol eristaytyy ja tuntee itsensa yha yksinaisemmaksi.

programme.title: High Holiday
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Liz ei ole kovin innokas viemaan poikaystavaansa vanhoillisen perheensa joulupaivalliselle. Mutta poikaystava ehdottaa, etta Liz maustaisi salaattikastikkeen marijuanalla, jotta tunnelma vapautuisi. Alkaa kaaos, kun kaikki ovat tietamattaan pilvessa ja perheensisaiset salaisuudet paljastuvat.

programme.title: This is England 88 (Part 3)
programme.desc: Tuhoisat tapahtumat, jotka tapahtuivat 18 kuukautta sitten, vainoavat Lolia (Vicky McClure) ja Woodya (Joe Gilgun), jotka molemmat kamppailevat selvitakseen tunteellisesta tappiosta. Lol huomaa nopeasti, etta hanen voimavaransa ovat ehtymassa, kun han yrittaa hoitaa uusia vastuita ja vanhoja velvoitteita. Yhdessa sielunkumppaninsa Woodyn kanssa, joka on epatoivoinen petoksestaan ja itse valitsemastaan maanpaosta jengin ulkopuolella, Lol eristaytyy ja tuntee itsensa yha yksinaisemmaksi.

programme.title: Santa Who?
programme.desc: Oikea joulupukki putoaa reesta ja menettaa muistinsa. Han tormaa pian tympaantyneeseen TV-toimittajaan, joka on hanen ainoa toivonsa palauttaa muisti ajoissa, etta joulu voidaan pelastaa.
