programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Claire
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 3 - Claire
programme.desc: One woman’s personal mission to reduce her household rubbish turned into a passion that gave birth to Southeast Asia’s first Zero-Waste Bulk Food shop. Claire is a driven and successful mother of three who turned away from her corporate job to channel her business-savvy into reducing our impact on the environment and contributing to the improvement of her local community.

programme.title: Zaira (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Zaira (Argentina)
programme.desc: For a long time Zaira let herself be defined solely as a survivor of the traumatic sexual assault that marked her life. In her healing search, she left behind the busy city life and moved to seek solace in the mountains of Mendoza. It is among these magnificent peaks that Zaira found peace within herself and harmony with her surroundings. Now, eager to help others heal, she is the leader of a trekking initiative that doubles as a support group for other women who are victims of sexual aggression.

programme.title: Ile (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Ile (Argentina)
programme.desc: Ileana studied business and worked long hours indoors for a multinational logistics company. Her love for dance and desire for movement drove her to quit her corporate life and begin a new chapter as a fitness trainer. Quickly exhausting the traditional methods available at her local gyms, she began to create innovative and groundbreaking exercise methods of her own. Her goal: to empower women by making them feel strong and feminine at the same time.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 1
programme.desc: Water and its beauty, water and its power, water and its fragility... the water we all need is becoming scarce, through our own fault. Some rivers are dry, others are diverted, cut off by dams, others are simply polluted, and this for decades. We will discover how humans transformed the nature in Argentina, then in China and its disproportionate Three Gorges Dam. We will also go in Botswana with the Okavango, this unique river which flows into a desert forming the famous Okavango Delta. Vu du Ciel makes you discover once again another world, magnificent but threatened.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Massages
programme.desc: Massage studio will show you the best massage techniques in places which will make you dream. Let us take care of you! Lay down, relax and forget all your problems.

programme.title: My Zen Relaxation
programme.desc: Turn down the lights, kick your shoes back, take a cup of tea... Youre on MyZen TV, time to relax.

programme.title: Pilates
programme.desc: Stay in shape with our pilates courses !

programme.title: Stretching
programme.desc: Stretching

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Practice Yoga from the comfort of your home with our experienced teatchers.

programme.title: Julien
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A healthy mind in a healthy body - Season 1 - Julien
programme.desc: Our coach Michaël is passionate about sports and well-being. Discover the recipe of an antioxidant drink while waiting for our guest. Our guest of the day is Julien, stage manager and radio host. They try to understand what oxidative stress is, and Michaël explains breathing techniques to work on cardiac coherence and feel better.

programme.title: Differential relaxation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - Differential relaxation
programme.desc: This exercise helps you develop what we call differential relaxation. The aim is to learn to relax the entire body except the parts necessary to the proper development of an action. For example, when youre working in the office, your back and your arms are often extremely contracted when really only your eyes and hands are involved in the task.

programme.title: A zen face
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 5 - A zen face
programme.desc: Is work stressing you out? Are you tired of the routine? Heres a series of relaxation exercises to help you unwind 100%.

programme.title: When you need to tell someone theyve lost their job
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 9 - When you need to tell someone theyve lost their job
programme.desc: An interview to prepare for? A capricious superior? These are complex situations to deal with. These exercises will help you mentally prepare for different professional situations.

programme.title: Adapting to a foreign country
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 9 - Adapting to a foreign country
programme.desc: An interview to prepare for? A capricious superior? These are complex situations to deal with. These exercises will help you mentally prepare for different professional situations.

programme.title: Energizing Breath
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 1 - Energizing Breath
programme.desc: Need to regenerate your body? Take the time to make some exercices to decompress and find a peaceful harmony.

programme.title: Dealing with the unexpected
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Audio advices - Season 9 - Dealing with the unexpected
programme.desc: An interview to prepare for? A capricious superior? These are complex situations to deal with. These exercises will help you mentally prepare for different professional situations.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - France, Le Bruit de leau
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we take you to “Le Bruit de leau”, an ecolodge nestled in the heart of the Baie de Somme nature reserve, in France. In the middle of nature, discover a place of absolute serenity inspired by the Japanese lifestyle and the travels of a great reporter, its founder.The intimate atmosphere that reigns at Le Bruit de leau (The Sound of Water) envelops you in a soothing calm, creating a cocoon made for relaxation and personal rejuvenation.This ecolodge allows us to cultivate awareness of the present moment and to open up to a fulfilling perception of our environment. Le Bruit de leau opens the doors to a transformative experience, where beauty of the natural...

programme.title: Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Reset - Season 1 - Sri Lanka, Santani
programme.desc: In this episode of Reset, we fly to Sri Lanka to discover an old tea plantation transformed into a sumptuous refuge: Santani.In order to find an alternative to the stress of urban life, the hotel offers a modern approach to Ayurveda. This traditional Indian medicine aims to establish a balance between the individual and the world around them. Thanks to the development of a personalized program, each visitor is invited to find harmony within this restorative sanctuary.Santani was created by a Sri Lankan eager to preserve our physical and spiritual well-being in a peaceful and healthy place to reconnect with the world differently. Lets discover a holistic approach to health, including...

programme.title: The flavors of chocolate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of chocolate
programme.desc: Today, the gluttons should not be disappointed since chocolate is in the spotlight. Discovered by the Mayans 2500 years ago and then more widely by the Aztecs, chocolate is today one of the favorite products in the world. And make no mistake about it: just as the kitchen has its great chefs, chocolate also has its great chocolatiers.As for recipes, Julie will introduce you to a cake that is only made in Saint Émilien and which combines chocolate with macarons, before heading to the Basque Country for a dessert to spice you up. We will then climb up the mountain to meet a Swiss cook. Finally, you will see that chocolate has several surprises in store for us: it has many virtues and is...

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Hotel on Pacific
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hotel on Pacific
programme.desc: Val takes us to one of the most beautiful hotels in California: The Belmont Hotel! Much more than a hotel, this place is a natural haven where everything is made to relax while overlooking the Pacific. While relaxation is key, we also seek adventures, don’t we? While in this dream setting, we will practice yoga among the turtles, walk around the vertical and organic garden with the Chef and treat ourselves with a massage with essential oils coming directly from the garden.

programme.title: Surfing and Vineyards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Surfing and Vineyards
programme.desc: Yoga and Surf are two corner stones of the Californian spirit. In this episode, the best of both worlds meets as Val shares a surf session with a local champion from Malibu! What about the surfing outfit ? No need for it, there is a yoga mat. Let’s head to Ojai, in the middle of a vineyards, and joint the "Topa Wines" group for a yoga session at the sunset. Together, we will enjoy the "Pink moment": the time when Ojai’s mountains turn pink and your mind is blown away.

programme.title: Repotting an indoor plant
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Repotting an indoor plant
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to take good care of our indoor plants. The plants that grow in our houses and flats are grown in pots. And when we buy a new plant, it is very important to repot it. The plants we buy come in pots that are often too small for them to grow well. Thats why you put it in a bigger pot.

programme.title: Fruity bowl
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Minute Bowl - Season 1 - Fruity bowl
programme.desc: In this episode we will prepare a delicious fruity bowl. For this you will need cottage cheese, banana, blueberries, raspberries, kiwi, strawberry, pomegranate, buckwheat and chia seeds. This amazing bowl includes many antioxidant fruits and is rich in vitamins C. It will help you fight against many pathologies and stay young.

programme.title: Agostina (Argentina)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Agostina (Argentina)
programme.desc: When Agostina’s mother was diagnosed with breast cancer, she began seeking out soft natural fabrics that would not irritate her mother’s sensitive skin. She found it almost impossible to find the right materials, so she decided to make her own. Research led her to bamboo fibers and she realised she could make a positive impact on the environment, while developing sustainable and ethical fashion.

programme.title: Solenn (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Solenn (Nantes)
programme.desc: A former school teacher reinvents herself when she discovers a passion for sharing other women’s stories. Always inspired by the journeys of strong women, Solenn began a blog to celebrate the women in her community. Solenn’s energy and passion fueled a dream of starting her own magazine. Thanks to a successful crowdfunding campaign, this dream blossomed into a professional career in journalism and she launched a print mook (magazine and book) called Etonnantes. Etonnantes features interviews of women of all backgrounds, celebrating their diversity and success in each field.

programme.title: Sophie (Nantes)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Sophie (Nantes)
programme.desc: Always an artist at heart, Sophie grew up in the countryside amongst nature and farm animals. Her love for creating art while respecting nature turned into a drive to seek out sustainable vegetable dyes.Today, her artwork and craft are intertwined as she makes beautiful prints and motifs that she colours with natural dyes, prepared from handpicked variety of flowers and plants that turn into stunning creations.

programme.title: So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - So the great rivers may live - Part 2
programme.desc: Yann Arthus-Bertrand thus continues his world tour and his inventory of the planet with the great rivers that suffer from mans excesses as a common thread. " So the great rivers may live" is the discovery of places, men and women who are fighting so that our waterways simply have their place on Earth. Thanks to his genius, man is correcting his mistakes: the Aral Sea, which once disappeared, is coming back. In New York, millions of people have drinking water thanks to the natural virtues of the forest.

programme.desc: The joints are the first parts of the body to react badly to stress, therefore it is essential to relax and relieve them as often as possible. Some ankle and knee rotations, combined with calm, controlled breathing will allow you to soothe your joints. With a few simple, well-targeted exercises, this session will bring you deep relaxation.

programme.desc: Bad posture and sagging shoulders are behaviors which can cause our body to suffer. MyZen TV offers a series of four exercises to massage your own back and shoulders. Practicing these simple and effective exercises can easily allow you to relax.

programme.title: Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 2 - Of Forests and Men - Part 2
programme.desc: The call of the Forest is about discovering places but above all it is about meeting those who protect this priceless heritage. Forests are essential to mankind. They capture CO2, promote the formation of clouds and therefore rain, protect the soil from erosion and provide a habitat for wildlife. From Madagascar, to France, to Cameroon, or even Eritrea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand sets out to discover the most beautiful forests, those who live in them, those who protect them and those who live off them.

programme.title: The cheese menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The cheese menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie sets on the roads of France to talk about an essential product on French tables: cheese. More than a gourmet craze, more than an end-of-meal treat, cheese is associated with French gastronomy, and is also recognized as Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. With nearly 1,000 varieties (soft cheeses, cooked, blue-veined, pressed cheeses…), the French are the biggest consumers of cheese in the world!

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Martial Arts and meditation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Martial Arts and meditation
programme.desc: Today, we will meet in Santa Monica in the hub of the last healthy trends. Val will make us discover Erewhon, the biggest organic and hipster supermarket in Los Angeles. She will then meet Troy, a guru of healthy consciousness, for an outdoor class that mixes martial arts and meditation. Then, on the legendary "Muscle Beach", the beach of all athletes, we will meet David, an action movie double, for a very aerial workout.

programme.title: Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hotel Paseo, Palm Springs
programme.desc: Val takes us to discover Palm Springs, the trendy and designer city in the heart of the California desert. In the heart of a private collection, we will discover all the flora of this region: an outdoor plant museum, one of the largest collections of cacti, and even tequila flowers. Then well head to the Paseo Hotel, one of the zen and design hotels of Palm Springs, where well meet the chef of the restaurant who will concoct his signature dishes. We will end our day with a relaxing massage with crystals.

programme.title: Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Carving a Halloween pumpkin
programme.desc: We meet again in the market garden of Romainville, for a special Halloween episode. In one of our first episodes, we learned how to sow a pumpkin seed. The pumpkins, which I had installed in my vegetable garden, have grown well now that we are in autumn. And thats good because today were going to show you how to dig a pumpkin to make a beautiful Halloween lantern.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare delicious potato cutlets accompanied by a creamy vegetable puree. The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Creamy cauliflower soup
programme.desc: In this recipe, well prepare a creamy, comforting cauliflower and celeriac veloute. This mild, delicate soup is spiced up with condiments like paprika, garlic and oregano, and a touch of olive oil for an even more gourmet texture. An ideal dish for a light starter or a warming dinner.

programme.title: Paul John Elliott
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Paul John Elliott
programme.desc: Without really knowing why, Paul Elliott will change his life from cartoonist to massage therapist. Aspired by success, money, success, he will create several clinics and will eventually lose the human aspects and lose himself. A new turn, a new meeting and Paul will finally resume his dreams of painting. Follow Paul in his tumults and his happiness found.

programme.title: Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Annabelle Higgins and Valérie Sirois
programme.desc: They are beautiful sisters, they are passionate about nature and they have a very strong common point: entrepreneurship. After years of evolution in consumer sectors, discover Annabelle and Valerie who knew how to listen to their passion to create a fitness and surf club (for Annabelle) and a zero waste grocery store (for Valerie).

programme.title: Véronick Desmarais
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Véronick Desmarais
programme.desc: The everyday work is not always easy and it is sometimes difficult to get by. If there is one thing that Veronick has learned from her experience and those around her, it is because she is able to surpass that and to embark on her dreams and plans to become a massage therapist. You will believe in your abilities too.

programme.title: Violaine Courtois
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Violaine Courtois
programme.desc: Everything started from the dream of her parents, she becomes a veterinarian. In her career that she launched backwards, Violaine will meet people who will take her to a different path of life. The chance will be at the rendezvous but it is especially the courage to resume studies and create his company that will build his project. Follow the encounters and travels of Violaine that brought her to fasciatherapy and nonviolent communication.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 2
programme.desc: The incredible diversity of flora and fauna, the fight against climate change, the balance between growth and sustainable development: these are all battles being fought on five continents. Yann Arthus-Bertrand takes us on this expedition. Were off to Gabon to discover the Ivindo National Park and Port-Gentil, then on to Sri Lanka in Kandi. Back to Gabon we go to Libreville, then Lambarene to talk about turtles and the health of the local people. Finally, off to Dhaka-Bangladesh.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Nature’s Heroes: Gabon - Part 1
programme.desc: How can we reconcile the development needed to sustain the lives of nearly seven billion people with the protection of the Earths natural resources? Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team have chosen Gabon to continue their survey of the planet. Well be discovering the Kongou Falls, the Langoue clearing with their elephant in Gabon. Then in Colombia, we will go on the island of Malpelo with their shark. Back to Gabon we will discover the Minkebe National Park and the bats in Franceville. We will also go to India in Hyderabad, which has convinced farmers to use no pesticides and no GMOs in their cultivation.

programme.title: Citrus flavors
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Citrus flavors
programme.desc: Julie takes you through the Pyrenees Orientales, then Corsica, before making a stop on the Côte dAzur, and concludes her journey between Rungis and Paris... all to explore the world of citrus fruits! These fruits add flavor, zest, and seasoning to any recipe, making them indispensable in the kitchen. They bring the warmth and sunshine of the South of France and the exoticism of distant lands. While were all familiar with lemons, clementines, and grapefruits, Julie introduces us to a thousand other varieties.

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Topanga Canyon, AMBA Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Topanga Canyon, AMBA Yoga
programme.desc: Val goes to the heart of Topanga Canyon, California, a favorite spot for yoga addicts and nature lovers. Here she will experience AMBA Yoga, a kind of hollistic yoga for women. We will also attend a Sound Bowl session, a Tibetan practice considered the ultimate in meditation. In the heart of Venice Beach, we will discover the "Plant Lab", a new high-tech application that records the vibrations of plants to create music. Finally, Val will present us the largest concept store of rare crystals in South America.

programme.title: Hot Springs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Hot Springs
programme.desc: Still in Palm Springs, we will discover the Parker Hotel, the most trendy and design hotel in town. A French chef will take us to cook in the middle of nature. Then, Val will go to Desert Springs, a town known for its natural hot springs. At one of the many spas in town, Val will test one of the springs and even attend a Sound Bowl session.

programme.title: Growing mushrooms at home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Growing mushrooms at home
programme.desc: We meet at the Romainville market garden centre to learn how to grow mushrooms at home. Some varieties, such as button mushrooms, oyster mushrooms or shiitake mushrooms, grow quite easily in mushroom houses. But you too can do it. And today we will show you how to make a miniature version of this kit to grow oyster mushrooms at home.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Mashed potatoes with vegetable gravy
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare mashed potatoes in vegetable stock. The mashed potatoes are soft and melt-in-the-mouth, while the richly flavored broth of bell bell pepper, carrot, zucchini, celeriac and tomato enhances the whole.

programme.title: Sweet potato bruschetta
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Sweet potato bruschetta
programme.desc: In this recipe, we reinvent the classic bruschetta by replacing the bread with a roasted sweet potato base. Garnished with tomatoes, guacamole, chilli pepper and a drizzle of olive oil, this healthy and tasty bruschetta is perfect for an aperitif or a light starter.

programme.title: Carine (Nice)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Carine (Nice)
programme.desc: After twenty years as a lawyer, Carine decided to give in to her desire to help others heal. Her inner journey led her to discover a passion for naturopathy as she rediscovered her love for nature and learned the healing qualities of the plants around her. Combined with a deep understanding of astrology and nutrition, she is now able to help others live better and find their own path.

programme.title: Virginie (Lyon)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Virginie (Lyon)
programme.desc: Virginie’s beautiful handwritten lettering decorates the walls and windows of many shops in and around Lyon, France, as she lives out her passion of finding beauty in every stroke. A former waitress, Virginie was struggling to find her calling when she suffered a life-altering horse accident that almost left her handicapped. At only 30, she was forced to put her whole life into perspective. She finally found herself through a love for graphic design and lettering, combined with a desire for freedom that came with working independently. To motivate other women, she has also launched “Ladyboss”, a network of inspiring women entrepreneurs.

programme.title: Laetitia (French Alps)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Laetitia (French Alps)
programme.desc: While pregnant with her daughter, Laetitia, a former journalist, experienced a strong desire to change lifestyles and move to the countryside. Remembering the teachings of her grandmother, she began to venture outdoors into the surrounding Alps and study the different plants at her fingertips. Today she holds a wealth of knowledge about the medicinal and aromatherapeutic value of plants that she applies to making natural products. With utmost respect for the environment, Laetitia gathers only what she needs in order to make herbal infusions.

programme.title: Louise (Oleron Island)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Louise (Oleron Island)
programme.desc: At only 20 years old, Louise is full of confidence and already achieved a personal dream of hers to share her passion for nutritious and locally-sourced ingredients on the island of Oleron, France. Repurposing a camping car, she set up a brunch and tea-time spot where the guests can hand-pick their ingredients in the adjacent organic fields. Louise transforms the ingredients into favourite creations of hers and even joins her father for boat trips when she needs to stock up on fresh fish for the menu!

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 1
programme.desc: In this instalment, Yann Arthus-Bertrand lifts the veil on the products people buy. Almost everything we buy has a direct impact on our environment. We head to Japan to talk about the impact of new technologies, then to the Republic of Congo in Bukavu for the coltan harvest. How does our total consumption affect the environment? What permanent brands are we imposing on our planet? How can we differentiate between useful and useless purchases?

programme.title: Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - Japan: Mass consumption - What the labels forget to mention - Part 2
programme.desc: Above all, these reports are an opportunity for Yann Arthus-Bertrand to take stock of the planet and denounce certain human behaviors that are at the root of dramatic, even irreversible, environmental and climatic degradation. Off to Tokyo, then Kenya, to an animal sanctuary. Then on to Mount Fuji to learn how to live there, and all the plastic that clogs up the seas. Reports will focus on everyday products, chosen for their destructive production practices for both people and the environment.

programme.title: The taste of bread
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The taste of bread
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes you on a bread trail to uncover the dedicated artisan bakers and millers. Her adventure will lead her through the Libourne region, then onwards to the North of France, the Ardèche, and the Aisne, where bakers have transformed bread into a powerful catalyst for social cohesion. While some individuals may avoid bread, particularly due to gluten-related concerns, others have chosen to reposition it at the forefront of the dining experience by championing its nutritional benefits. This commitment is shared by several chefs whom Julie will meet at the conclusion of her expedition.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Ojai Valley Lavender Festival
programme.desc: Val Kahl is in the heart of Ojai, the lavender town, where she takes a tour in Ojai Valley Lavender Festival and tastes drink, gluten-free cookies and organic cooking products made of lavender. She later found herself in the middle of lavender field while stopping by the Frog Creek Farm. After working out on the hot power yoga around palm trees in Caravan Outpost, she heads out to Gratitude Rock for an organic fresh juice tasting with an avocado ranch view.

programme.title: Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Japanese pagodas and Coconut Massage
programme.desc: Val goes to Nicholas, a master of enlightenment, at his wellness ranch. Here, Val will try out some new high-tech relaxation sessions. She will then go to one of the zenest hotels in California, where she will participate in a yoga session in a Japanese pagoda, followed by a coconut massage. She will test a Cryo-Cafe, a new concept store that mixes coffee break and cryotherapy session. Finally, she will attend a Theremin session, a very special relaxation ceremony.

programme.title: Thinning seedlings
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Thinning seedlings
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to continue gardening together. In our previous episodes, we sowed chives and radishes. Today, were going to learn how to take good care of them. And as a bonus, well show you a great technique to easily get even more plants in your garden. Lets get started!

programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Risotto with asparagus
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Risotto with asparagus
programme.desc: In this recipe, we prepare a creamy asparagus risotto, a delicate and refined dish. Arborio rice is slowly simmered in a flavorful broth, then combined with crisp asparagus and melted Parmesan. A hint of lemon and fresh herbs enhances this delicious and comforting meal.

programme.title: Potato cutlets with vegetable puree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Vegetarian Delights - Season 1 - Potato cutlets with vegetable puree

The cutlets are crispy on the outside with Japanese breadcrumbs and tender on the inside, while the celeriac puree adds a touch of sweetness and lightness. This dish is perfect for a comforting and tasty vegetarian meal.

programme.title: Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Juliette (Morbihan)
programme.desc: Juliette has long been aware of the delicate beauty of nature. For years she spent her life on the sea, organising regattas for the traditional sailboats that are famous in the French region of Morbihan. Her appreciation for the elements made for a smooth transition as she decided to leave the water behind and return to the earth. Learning to shape a ball of clay into a graceful and elegant object, she discovered a passion for ceramics. Today, she lives from her creations and makes pieces that reflect their surroundings, the stunning Gulf of Morbihan.

programme.title: Anna (Brittany)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Anna (Brittany)
programme.desc: Anna’s unusual background provided inspiration for her life change. Her career began as a wolf trainer for cinema and it was during these years that she developed her deep love for animals. After being tired of seeing them used as props and constantly in cages, she decided to leave the world of show business behind and start an eco-friendly sheep and goat pasture. To further share her passion for these gentle animals, Anna has opened a conservatory farm where visitors can experience first-hand the joys of being close to nature. She also makes amazing goat cheese!

programme.title: Cristina (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Cristina (Spain)
programme.desc: At 31 years old, the last thing Cristina expected when she went to see the doctor about a blocked ear was to leave the consultation with a diagnosis for Breast Cancer. This young and passionate sociologist decided to apply the same philosophy to her treatment as she did when surfing: when a wave crashes down on you, get up and try again. Through her healing journey she deepened her love for the ocean and also discovered the therapeutic capabilities of yoga for cancer patients. Today she shares her practice through surf and yoga retreats and is specialised in oncological yoga, helping others heal.

programme.title: Idoia (Spain)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 4 - Idoia (Spain)
programme.desc: Idoia thrives on weaving together the sources of inspiration that surround her. Heavily influenced by the natural beauty of her home region of Galicia, Spain, she creates unique woven pieces from diverse and beautiful materials. Idoia’s pieces represent her vision of a modern woman, drawing from the traditions and experiences of those who perfected the craft before her and also pushing to innovate and adapt her creations for the modern world. Her recent collaboration with luxury fashion house Loewe is a dream come true for this modern artisan.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 1
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 1
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: A la carte grills
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - A la carte grills
programme.desc: If youre a nature enthusiast and a fan of outdoor cooking, the upcoming season is perfect for barbecue enthusiasts! Our journey will take us to Aube, nestled in the heart of the Brevonnes forest, and then to the Massif des Bauges, where grilling and snow create a unique combination. Afterward, well explore the Libournais region, where well uncover cooking techniques that make use of vine shoots, which are plentiful in the area. Just a short distance from the vineyards, well arrive at another corner of Gironde, the Blaye region, where the cooking method remains consistent but features a distinctly local ingredient: eel.

programme.title: Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Cryotherapy and Vinyasa Yoga
programme.desc: Its in an episode full of surprise that we meet with Val Khal in the heart of Los Angeles for a visit to the new trendy wellbeing boutique Springs. This new concept store offers the opportunity to make Vinyasa yoga wearing a trendy outfit, treat yourself to a revitalizing juice detox before heading to a Cryotherapy session without leaving the venue! For a relaxing time after an intensive Vinyasa yoga session, Val takes you to a session of Fire cupping where the heath is ideal for getting rid of muscular pains from day-to-day stress.

programme.title: Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Acro Yoga on a Skyscraper
programme.desc: Val takes us to Los Angeles, on the roof of one of the most prestigious hotels in Beverly Hills for a session of acro yoga, aerial acrobatic yoga. Then, in the heart of Downtown, Val will experience a glass slide down one of the tallest towers in California. Shell also try SandBox Fitness, the trendy indoor surfing class, before trying Lazerfit, a new way to work out that combines warm-up, stretching and laser tag.

programme.title: Cutting a tomato plant

Come on, lets see how they have grown.

programme.title: The Iris flower
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Origami - Season 1 - The Iris flower
programme.desc: Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. In modern usage, the word “origami” is used as an inclusive term for all paper folding, regardless of their cultural origin. Different folding and sculpting techniques, new models, bright colors – you’ll see all of this in our program! We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and amazing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We go to China in the province of Yunan, where a plant with exceptional virtues against malaria has been discovered. Then we travel to Africa, where mans intervention in the ecosystem of Lake Victoria has triggered a considerable imbalance. We will also explore to Greenland to meet the polar bears, the first victims of the melting ice.

programme.title: Sweets on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Sweets on the menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us down a different kind of yellow-brick road, one that tastes of childhood and gourmet delights: the road of sweets. France may be famous for its gastronomy, but its not to be outdone when it comes to pastries and confectionery - quite the opposite. “Betises” from Cambrai, "Berlingots” from Carpentras, "Calissons” from Aix-en-provence, every region in France has its own sweet or confectionery.

programme.title: Acrobatic Yoga
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Acrobatic Yoga
programme.desc: In this episode, Val gets to know Jamie and her thirty gons whom mystical sounds invite to introspection and relaxation in a relaxing setting. She then attends a perilous acrobatic yoga class with Vibe Yoga where her sense of balance has been challenged a few times. Believe or leave! This is Bol Meditation’s motto where Val discovers the benefits of Intense meditation on our body and mind. All together, this place is a piece of heaven in the middle of ettic L.A.

programme.title: Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Chromo Yoga and Detox Juices with Mia Frye
programme.desc: Val will make us discover Chromo Yoga, which combines light and color therapy with yoga. Then well meet Mia Frye who will present us all the detox cures of the moment at Atelier Nubio. Finally, Val will test gluten-free gourmet waffles, both sweet and savory, the new trendy dessert for Parisian women.

programme.title: Melliferous plants
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Melliferous plants
programme.desc: Lets get together to continue discovering new plants together. Look at all these flowers, they are honey plants. But what are honey plants? Doesnt that make you think of another word? The word honey? Yes, because honey plants are plants that attract insects, and in particular bees, which feed on these flowers to make honey.

programme.title: Destination Sardinia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Sardinia
programme.desc: The first stop on this journey to the land of happy, long life is the Ogliastra region of Sardinia. Here, almost one in five inhabitants is over 90 - 20 times more than in France! Yet this is a far cry from the Mediterranean diet recommended by nutritionists: meat and cholesterol galore. Even more astonishing, consanguinity is paradoxically conducive to the extreme longevity of the inhabitants... our wellness food specialist and a general practitioner will investigate these phenomena and meet nonagenarians and centenarians with exceptional stories.

programme.title: Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.desc: To better understand the role of these explosive mountains located all over the world, on land or under the sea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes to Italy, the country with the most active volcanoes in Europe. Accompanied by volcano expert Jacques-Marie Bardintzeff, the photographer meets those people who have chosen to live with « their » volcano, in spite of the dangers involved in this kind of proximity.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Winterleiten (AUT)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Trans Napoli - A Mountain Bike Expedition Naples (ITA)
programme.desc: TransNapoli is an urban MTB adventure led by legendary mountain bike pioneer Hans Rey. It is a colorful five-day tour that crosses the Amalfi and Naples regions of Italy on mountain bikes and e-bikes.

programme.title: THE RIO CAQUETA
programme.desc: Jules Domine and Tyler Bradt, obsessed and addicted to whitewater adventure, make a plan to journey the long way, from the source of Rio Caqueta 1,000 Kilometers downstream to an unreal big water canyon deep in the Colombian Amazon.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paragliders across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min Leatt LiveManiacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Teodor Kabakchiev (BUL).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #31: DATEV Challenge Roth 2025
programme.desc: The Roth Triathlon took place again on July 6, 2025. The sporting event in this triathlon stronghold has been home to triathletes from all over the world since 1984. It consists of a 3.8 km swim, 180 km bike ride, and 42.2 km run through the Roth triathlon district.

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters on the field at once, but each creature receives a power boost!

programme.title: Legend of the Dragons
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse!

programme.title: The Creator Returns
programme.desc: Confusion abound when enemies become friends... and friends become enemies! Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they’re asked for help from a one-eyed former foe!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 1
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Wielding his newest whacked-out Toon terrors, Pegasus is ready to repeat his previous victory against Kaiba!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 2
programme.desc: Not only does Alister’s mighty fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba’s monsters!

programme.title: An Unexpected Enemy
programme.desc: On the way to Industrial Illusions, Yugi and friends are ambushed by a band of motorcycle thugs - until their favorite friend soars to the rescue!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 1
programme.desc: Can this be?! Mai has joined the enemy! Wielding the sinister sorcery of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai unequivocally calculates to trap Joey’s soul for Dartz’s malevolent master plan!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 2
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the arcane abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies into devastating combat formations!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 3
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer?

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world’s chaotic conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and a lost civilization!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: The Final Journey
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Not only does Atem still have all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn’t have a single monster on the field!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: Seeing his father carded in front of his eyes, Yuyas rage reaches a boiling point as he accepts Yuris challenge. But not only does he have to contend with Yugo and Yuris dragons, but Zarcs ever growing influence over him.

programme.title: Time to Reunite!
programme.desc: The four dimensions start to fuse together as Yuya continues to struggle against Yuri. Forced to discard his trump card, things seem hopeless. Yuyas friends then arrive to encourage him to keep fighting no matter what.

programme.title: A Most Brutal Duel
programme.desc: Yuya absorbs all of his counterparts and reclaimed his true form as Supreme King Z-ARC. Starting to lay waste to the Fusion Dimension, Sora and Edo challenge Zarc to try and reach out to Yuyas spirit.

programme.title: A Dark Summoning
programme.desc: The four dimensions continue to unite as Zarc effortlessly crushes Sora and Edo. Kaito and Shun continue the fight against Zarc while people from Heartland and Neo Domino City start appearing in the Fusion Dimension.

programme.title: Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Gongenzaka and Jack fight against Zarc next, trying their best to reach out to Yuyas soul buried in Zarcs darkness. A revived Crow and Sawatari decide to join in when Zarcs Supreme King Dragons swarm the field.

programme.title: Clash Talk
programme.desc: Crow notices that Zarc is starting to lose his composure, leading him and Sawatari to up their game against Zarcs dragons. As dimensional integration is getting closer to completion, Reiji tries to convince his dad to stop Zarc.

programme.title: A Ray of Hope
programme.desc: Rays soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

programme.title: Swinging Back into Action
programme.desc: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancers goal for good.

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 1
programme.desc: The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite’s skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Furry Fury
programme.desc: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
programme.desc: It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 1
programme.desc: Earth and Astral World are under attack! Yuma and Astral are the only ones who can stop it, but saving their planets may come at the ultimate price…

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone’s stealing memories, and the Super Secret Numbers Club are going to find out who! But when the hunters become the hunted, Yuma’s friends quickly realize that they need help from an exterminator!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories! Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 1
programme.desc: With Vector’s patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma! Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 2
programme.desc: Shark and Quattro struggle to keep their heads above water as they battle the Barian duelist from the deep, Chironex!

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma’s plans!

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 4
programme.desc: With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 1
programme.desc: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 2
programme.desc: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Fight for a Friend
programme.desc: Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash! Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!

programme.title: Farewell for a Friend
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion! Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 1
programme.desc: Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 2
programme.desc: As Quinton and Treys devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian! Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!

programme.title: The Heart of the Cards
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi’s Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: The Gauntlet Is Thrown
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa’s soul as his prize!

programme.title: Journey to the Duelist Kingdom
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister’s eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi’s deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Into The Hornets Nest
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they’ve ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he’s to survive!

programme.title: The Ultimate Great Moth
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil’s first wave of Duel Monsters, Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power every turn! Can Yugi find a way to destroy this winged beast before it destroys him?

programme.title: First Duel
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai’s secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Attack from the Deep
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Everythings Relative
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp’s crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba’s brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother’s company!

programme.title: Duel With a Ghoul
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba. But with his best cards resting at the bottom of the ocean, Yugi must discover a new strategy to survive fake Kaiba’s powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Give up the Ghost
programme.desc: Yugi defeats Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: The Dueling Monkey
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends’ help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own. But as Rex Raptor’s relentless dinos destroys Joey’s best Duel Monsters, will Tristan’s card remind him that with his friends, he is never alone in battle?

programme.title: Trial by Red-Eyes
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Joey must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of Duelist Kingdom!

programme.title: Evil Spirit of the Ring
programme.desc: Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves! Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!

programme.title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel
programme.desc: Pegasus’s hired duelist PaniK cheats Mai of all her Star Chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when PaniK’s Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?

programme.title: Winning Through Intimidation
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes PaniK: “I’ll finish you in three turns.” Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: The Scars of Defeat
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus! Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon and Joey’s Red-Eyes B. Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 1
programme.desc: The #1 American duelist Bandit Keith’s gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave! Joey is all alone in the battle this time!

programme.title: Arena of Lost Souls, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey’s last ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith’s zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: Trapped in the labyrinth cave, Yugi and friends find an alternate exit, but the door is guarded by Pegasus’s Paradox Brothers. Yugi and Joey will no longer be battling solo; they band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers! The battle for all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus’s castle is on the line!

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey pool their strengths and manage to fend off their opponents’ monsters, but things are about to change as the Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Double Trouble Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, Summoned Skull and Red-Eyes B. Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of Gate Guardian. Individually, our heroes have no chance, but they will unleash the greatest power of all: teamwork!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 1
programme.desc: Using the magic of the Millennium Eye, Pegasus traps Mokuba’s soul inside a card right before Kaiba’s eyes! In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba summons Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Face Off, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi’s heart is split in two!

programme.title: Shining Friendship
programme.desc: Having lost his Star Chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra Star Chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Champion Vs. Creator, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba’s soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people’s minds. Can Kaiba defeat an opponent who knows his moves even before he does?

programme.title: Champion Vs. Creator, Part 2
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus’s Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba’s soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba! Yugi has had enough!

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: T’was the night before the final battle, and many creatures are stirring! Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus’s secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Duel Identity, Part 1
programme.desc: Under Pegasus’s weighty glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish tactical errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpies Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the intense pressure?

programme.title: Duel Identity, Part 2
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Keiths Machinations, Part 1
programme.desc: Joey frantically searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it from him. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new, and unexpected, friend!

programme.title: Keiths Machinations, Part 2
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith’s Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith’s battle strategy to metalicize his Red-Eyes B. Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1
programme.desc: With his pride in his strength as a duelist on the line, Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other’s strategies and cards as they struggle to keep their thoughts of past loyalties at the back of their minds.

programme.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him, the very card he gave Joey as a sign of friendship! However, as the two battle each other valiantly and one comes out the victor, they find confirmation of the strength of their friendship that surpasses any duel.

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba and Mokuba on the line. Meanwhile, Tristan and Bakura infiltrate the castle to find the Kaiba brothers, but at this crucial moment, is Bakura turning back into his evil self again?

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi’s monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi’s soul into a card, just like Kaiba?

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus’s mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus’s Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi crumples in exhaustion under the crippling power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi’s chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!

programme.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi’s Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with… Kuriboh? The smallest, weakest creature in the game? Has Yugi given up, or does he have one last strategy to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat? The Shadow Game comes to a close!

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: The Pegasus Saga comes to an end, but a new journey is about to begin! Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi’s mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: A Ray of Hope
programme.desc: Rays soul possesses Reira so she can battle against Zarc alongside Reiji. Zarc boasts that he is the creator of Pendulum Summon, but Ray is determined to stop him once and for all using the four natural energy cards.

programme.title: Swinging Back into Action
programme.desc: Things have seemingly returned to normal in the Pendulum Dimension, but Yuya gets the feeling that something is missing. Reiji has him duel against Tsukikage to restore his memories and make him finish the Lancers goal for good.

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 1
programme.desc: The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite’s skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Furry Fury
programme.desc: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
programme.desc: It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

programme.title: Fists of Fury: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma and Astrals race to face Don Thousand is stopped cold by the hot-blooded Alito, now brainwashed by the Barian deity! Can they think fast enough to free Alito of Don Thousand, or will he take the two down for the count?!

programme.title: Fists of Fury: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Astral duel desperately to try and turn an old enemy into their newest ally, but with Don Thousand in Alito’s corner, Yuma and Astral find themselves up against the ropes!

programme.title: Power Play
programme.desc: Vector sets his sights on squashing Marin and Dumon, and there’s nothing Shark can do but watch his sister and best friend squirm before his eyes.

programme.title: Barian vs. Barian
programme.desc: The thunderous battle between Marin, Dumon and Vector shatters expectations as it nears its startling end! Meanwhile, Alito stands tall against his former friend, the Barian behemoth - Girag!

programme.title: Vector the Victor
programme.desc: Marins duel with Vector charges to its climactic conclusion! Can Marin outduel this venomous villain, or will Vector remain invincible?!

programme.title: Dragon Strife: Part 1
programme.desc: The long foreshadowed faceoff is finally here! Kite and Mizar go toe-to-toe to settle who is the one true Galaxy-Eyes master!

programme.title: Dragon Strife: Part 2
programme.desc: The fierce face-off between Kite and Mizar soars to new heights as their battle to determine the one true Galaxy-Eyes master roars to a finish!

programme.title: The Forsaken Palace
programme.desc: Nash races to face Vector, but with Vectors enhanced strength, he may be speeding towards his own demise!

programme.title: Clash of the Emperors
programme.desc: While Nash and Vectors danger-fueled duel hits dizzying new heights of havoc, the truth behind Vector’s dark past is revealed!

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: Yuma teams up with an unlikely ally to take down the great Barian deity, Don Thousand! Can this twosome draw out a victory, or will Don Thousand douse any hope these heroes have of being victorious?

programme.title: The Source Code
programme.desc: Yuma and Shark’s battle with Don Thousand takes a treacherous turn when the great Barian deity reveals he can rewrite their cards into entirely different cards! Can Yuma and Shark defeat a foe who can change their every move?

programme.title: A Thousand Ways to Lose
programme.desc: Yuma and Shark turn the tides and put Don Thousand on the brink of defeat, but DonThousand still has a thousand tricks up his sleeve!

programme.title: The Wrath of Rebecca
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her! She’s here to claim back the card that Grandpa stole from her grandfather many years ago!

programme.title: Ties of Friendship
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it’s not the power of the cards, but the heart that’s in them that counts.

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 1
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of KaibaCorp trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game! Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 2
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can Yugi and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Legendary Heroes, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mai lose all their life points! Can Yugi and Kaiba, two former opponents, work together and face the biggest enemy of their lives?

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: A new student, Duke Devlin, defeats Joey in a game of Duel Monsters, forcing Joey to become his servant. Duke forces Joey to wear a dog costume and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey’s freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start. His chances do not improve as Duke reveals that he designed Dungeon Dice Monsters with Pegasus’s aid! Can Yugi learn the new complex rules, much less form a strategy, before he is soundly defeated?

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 3
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi’s position is helpless!

programme.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters, Part 4
programme.desc: After Duke’s all-powerful Orgoth the Relentless dices Yugi’s entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points! Yugi’s last hope rests in one final dice roll in the thrilling conclusion to Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: The Mystery Duelist, Part 1
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle, and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back! However, this is no ordinary soothsayer; he’s a familiar and formidable foe from Duelist Kingdom… or is he? Can Yugi beat him all alone without the help of his friends or the spirit inside the Puzzle?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E286 Undercover Love S1 E286
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E40 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E40
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E286 King of Hearts S1 E286
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E286 Second Chances S1 E286
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E80 Jodha Akbar S3 E80
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E286 This is Fate S1 E286
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E286 Undercover Love S1 E286
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.
